snippet: Richard Pryor, Dick Cheney and Muammar el-Qaddafi are among the personalities that will be the focus of Showtime’s new documentary features.
abstract: Showtime has begun producing original documentaries, mostly profile pieces on controversial public figures, in an attempt to stay competitive with other cable channels; Showtime will inaugurate strand of original documentaries, called 'Sho Closeup,' starting with Sundance Film Festival premiere of The World According to Dick Cheney, directed by R J Cutler and Greg Finton.
lead_paragraph: Richard Pryor, Dick Cheney and Muammar el-Qaddafi are among the personalities that will be the focus of Showtime’s new documentary features.

headline.seo: Richard Pryor and Dick Cheney Focus of Showtime Documentaries
